about_the_game:
In this cozy single player game, you explore wondrous landscapes to find a legendary lost treasure. In your search for clues, you travel from island to island and set up camp with your crew of adventurers. They task you with finding different places in the surrounding landscape. Explore the island, find the locations you are looking for and pinpoint them on your map. Complete quests for your companions and follow the trace of the hidden treasure.



Your task as a cartographer is to explore each island and mark all the relevant locations on your map. You start with a simple map that only includes the coastline of the island. The challenge now is to fill this map with the landmarks, ruins and unique sites scattered across the land. To do so you have to rely on your sense of direction and truly get to know your surroundings like a real adventurer. Unlock tools to determine the precise location of these places and lead your crew to the hidden treasure.





Each island is handcrafted with great attention to detail. Discover ancient ruins, animals and secret places in the stunning scenery. Focus on exploring your surroundings without quest markers and other distractions. Learn about the origins of this whimsical world and explore each island until you know it like the back of your hand.




On this journey you are accompanied by several unique characters who you will learn more about over time. Other characters will join your crew while some might decide to set out on their own. Discover their story and personality with each mission you are given.




  • Set off on a great adventure with your crew and embark on a cozy treasure hunt
  • Discover the unique cartography game mechanic - interact with the world in a way you never have before
  • Help your crew members find what they are looking for and get to know each of them over the course of your journey
  • Experience a cozy game that calls upon your sense of orientation
  • Focus on the beautiful environment and truly get to know your surroundings - no quest markers, no information overload
  • Take all the time you like to explore the islands and complete the missions - no time pressure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this game YOU make the maps! Embark on a treasure hunt as cartographer of an adventure crew. Orientate yourself on uncharted islands and measure distances to mark locations as accurately as possible.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
